page.title: 05The Residents-a survey.
page.content: It is very much a working population with no retired residents.There are a few married couples and only one child.The majority are young to middle aged and single.Their previous work experiences are widely various.Of those surveyed the average length of residence was nearly 4 years -with 4 or 5 visits to the mainland annually. (main reasons were:doctors,dentists, shopping,holidays and visiting relatives).Most of the residents live in Barton Cottages and Pig's Paradise. Among the benefits of Lundy cited were -"friendly company,pleasant working conditions,no sense of 'rat-race', usually exciting or enjoyable weather conditions,good organisation to work for,lack of traffic and other petty things you are plagued with on the mainland,challenging job,very different way of life....."
